definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
assimilation/anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)

sentences.english: Keep in mind that Drone Platforms don't supply Assimilators when sold.
sentences.chinese: 时刻记得机械平台在卖掉得时候不提供同化者。

sentences.english: Then, the simulated results are compared with NCEP ocean assimilation data.
sentences.chinese: 然后，将模拟的海温同NCEP海洋同化资料相比较。

sentences.english: The main diagenesis is fractional crystallization assimilation and contamination.
sentences.chinese: 成岩作用是分离结晶和同化混染联合作用。

sentences.english: The offsprings of the immigrants have been assimilated into American culture.
sentences.chinese: 这些移民的后代已经被美国文化同化了。

sentences.english: Many new immigrants set foot in this land ill-prepared to assimilate into the American melting pot.
sentences.chinese: 许多新移踏脚美国并未有准备同化入社会的大熔炉。

sentences.english: What is the role of the UN Secretary-General?
sentences.chinese: 成岩作用是分离结晶和同化混染联合作用。

sentences.english: Your Assimilators are safe, and they don't have to cover much ground .
sentences.chinese: 你的同化者是安全的，而且它们不需要走很长的路。

sentences.english: Europeans and Jews do not readily assimilate.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人和犹太人不易同化。

sentences.english: The bigger kernel helps compete assimilate at that time.
sentences.chinese: 大粒生长势强，有利于对当时同化物的竞争。

sentences.english: The U.S. is still an astonishing assimilation machine.
sentences.chinese: 美国仍然是惊人的同化机器。

sentences.english: The Aztec confederacy began a campaign of conquest and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 阿芝科特联盟源于一场对外征服和同化的战役。

sentences.english: The essence of such a policy is national oppression and assimilation.
sentences.chinese: 这一政策的实质是民族压迫和民族同化。

sentences.english: Assimilatorypower and compensation intensity of canopy leaves and awns were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析讨论了冠层叶片和芒的同化能力和补偿能力。

sentences.english: Non-English-speaking peoples tended to become quickly assimilated.
sentences.chinese: 非英语民族很快被同化了。

sentences.english: The result shows that the photosynthate and the water from xylem transportation in phloem are closely interrelated.
sentences.chinese: 同化物分子和水分子在韧皮部的运输存在多速率现象。

sentences.english: Microbe assimilation plays a leading role in the intermittent reaction.
sentences.chinese: 间歇反应中微生物同化作用占主导地位。

definition: (of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to reject/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to repel
to split up/to divide/to break up/fission/schism
